name: Neovoid (SkywolfGameStudios)
description:
Welcome to the NEOVOID!

Travel through a space and time continuum endlessly while trying to avoid timebreaker walls that will halt your ship. How long can you survive?!

Made with Blender + Unreal Engine 4. We built the core gameplay in about 3 hours, the rest took a little longer to spruce up to how it is now.

https://skywolfstudios.weebly.com
https://twitter.com/skywolfgamestds
https://instagram.com/skywolfgamestudios
https://facebook.com/skywolfgamestudios

HOW TO PLAY:    Simply Move your Mouse Around to control and fly your ship!
